mapper.select: select board_idx, title, hit_cnt, date_format(created_datetime, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') as created_datetime from t_board where deleted_yn = 'N' order by board_idx desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_board (title, contents, created_datetime, creator_id) values (#{title}, #{contents}, now(), 'tester');
mapper.select: select board_idx, title, hit_cnt, contents, date_format(created_datetime, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') as created_datetime, creator_id from t_board where deleted_yn = 'N' and board_idx = #{boardIdx}
mapper.update: update t_board set hit_cnt = hit_cnt + 1 where board_idx = #{boardIdx}
